ai-thag12.2:1.1_0: I was born in a low-class family.
ai-thag12.2:1.2_0: poor, with few food and little food.
ai-thag12.2:1.4_0: I threw out the old flowers.
ai-thag12.2:2.4_0: and paid respects to many people.
ai-thag12.2:3.2_0: at the fore of the mendicant Saṅgha.
ai-thag12.2:3.4_0: was entering the capital city of Magadhā.
ai-thag12.2:5.1_0: When I had paid homage at the Teacher’s feet,
ai-thag12.2:6.2_0: and having compassion for the whole world,
ai-thag12.2:7.3_0: I have completed what the Teacher taught,
ai-thag12.2:7.4_0: just as the victor advised me.
ai-thag12.2:8.1_0: In the first watch of the night,
ai-thag12.2:8.3_0: In the middle watch of the night,
ai-thag12.2:8.5_0: In the last watch of the night,
ai-thag12.2:8.6_0: I shattered the mass of darkness.
ai-thag12.2:9.1_0: At the end of the night,
ai-thag12.2:9.4_0: and revered me with joined hands.
ai-thag12.2:10.2_0: Homage to you, supreme among men!
ai-thag12.2:10.4_0: you, sir, are worthy of teacher’s offerings.”
ai-thag12.2:11.2_0: at the foot of the Devas,
ai-thag12.2:12.3_0: that’s how a brahmin becomes a brahmin by this.
ai-thag12.2:12.7_0: The Book of the Twelves is finished.
ai-thag12.2:13.0_0: Then they pass away from that host of gods
ai-thag12.2:13.2_0: Those Elders who were great power,
